params.allowedContract: The address of the allowed contract

borrowAllowed(address,address,uint256).details: Currently the borrowController checks if contracts are part of an allow list and enforces a daily limit

params.msgSender: The message sender trying to borrow

returns._0: A boolean that is true if borrowing is allowed and false if not.

params.deniedContract: The addres of the denied contract

onRepay(uint256).details: This is necessary to prevent a DOS attack, where a user borrows the daily limit and immediately repays it again.

params.market: The addres of the market contract

params._operator: The address of the new operator.

allow(address).notice: Allows a contract to use the associated market.

borrowAllowed(address,address,uint256).notice: Checks if a borrow is allowed

deny(address).notice: Denies a contract to use the associated market

onRepay(uint256).notice: Reduces the daily limit used, when a user repays debt

setDailyLimit(address,uint256).notice: Sets the daily borrow limit for a specific market

setOperator(address).notice: Sets the operator of the borrow controller. Only callable by the operator.

documentation.text:
@notice Sets the operator of the borrow controller. Only callable by the operator.
@param _operator The address of the new operator.

@notice Allows a contract to use the associated market.
@param allowedContract The address of the allowed contract

@notice Denies a contract to use the associated market
@param deniedContract The addres of the denied contract

@title Borrow Controller
@notice Contract for limiting the contracts that are allowed to interact with markets
